CustomField.description: Sum of the estimated telecommunications expenditures of this business for all wireline communication services including voice, data and transport services but excluding wireless services. Total TelSpend is the sum of Voice TelSpend and Data TelSpend. This estimate is based on a GeoResults proprietary model and is expressed in $(000) per year.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of the estimated telecommunications expenditures of this business for all wireline communication services including voice, data and transport services but excluding wireless services. Value expressed in $(000) per year.
CustomField.label: Total TelSpend Per Year
